tasks.coref.i2b2

Class I2B2CorefWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.i2b2.I2B2CorefWriter

  • public class I2B2CorefWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A writer that contains methods to convert coreference resolution pipeline results to the format that is expected for the i2b2/VA corpus.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      Constructors

      I2B2CorefWriter()

      • asI2B2Chain

        public static java.lang.String asI2B2Chain(CoreferenceChain chain)
        Gets the string representation of a coreference chain formatted according to i2b2 format.

        Parameters:
        chain - the coreference chain
        Returns:
        the i2b2 string representation of the chain, or an empty string if the chain is malformed

      • getChainType

        public static java.lang.String getChainType(SemanticItem sem)
        Gets the i2b2 chain type to assign to a semantic object.

        If the semantic object is an entity, it will return the type of that entity. If the semantic object is a coreference chain, it will return the type of entities involved in this chain.

        Parameters:
        sem - the semantic object
        Returns:
        the chain type to assign to this semantic object

      • getTermString

        public static java.lang.String getTermString(SemanticItem sem)
        Gets the i2b2 string representation for an individual term.

        If the input semantic object is a relation with a predicate, the predicate is taken into account. i2b2 format uses sentence and word indexes to represent terms. The term string has the format 

         c="<term_string>" <sentence_index>:<first_word_index> 
 <sentence_index>:<last_word_index>
        Parameters:
        sem - the term
        Returns:
        the string representation of the term
